headline: HCA Healthcare (HCA) Q3 2024 Earnings Transcript
summary: Over the years, HCA Healthcare has developed industry-leading enterprise capabilities to support our hospitals during disasters.  First, HCA Mission Hospital, which is the only hospital in the Asheville area, was affected by Hurricane Helene and it has continued to operate and provide high quality patient care, even with significant city infrastructure in disrepair, and that's primarily water.

headline: What To Expect From HCA Healthcare’s (HCA) Q4 Earnings
summary: Hospital operator HCA Healthcare (NYSE:HCA) will be reporting earnings this Tuesday morning. Here’s what investors should know.
